# Available Links

## E-commerce Platforms
- [Tmall](https://m.tb.cn/h.huqFrYoS4vhGZ3P): A popular online shopping platform in China, offering a wide range of products.
- [JD](https://mall.jd.com/index-1000625403.html?from=pc): Another major Chinese e-commerce platform known for its reliable delivery and quality products.
- [Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/AutoBot-Handheld-Portable-Cleaning-Rechargeable/dp/B0D73RY2LB?ref_=ast_sto_dp&th=1): A global e-commerce giant providing a vast selection of products and services.
- [Shop](https://autobot.im/collections/shop): A general shopping platform for various products.

## Vacuum Cleaners
- [VX Max vacuum cleaner](https://autobot.im/products/new-disruptive-20kpa-autobot-vx-max-handheld-vacuum-cleaner): A high-performance vacuum cleaner designed for deep cleaning.
- [V mini max vacuum cleaner](https://autobot.im/products/2021-new-product-autobot-v-mini-max-handheld-vacuum-cleaner): A compact vacuum cleaner ideal for quick clean-ups.
- [Self Clean Series](https://autobot.im/collections/autobot-self-clean-handler-vaccum/Self-Clean): A series of vacuum cleaners featuring self-cleaning technology for convenience.
- [AutoBot VX4](https://autobot.im/products/autobot-vx4-new-high-performance-car-vacuum-cleaner): An advanced robotic vacuum cleaner with smart navigation features.
- [AutoBot VM5](https://autobot.im/products/autobot-vm5-car-vacuum-handheld-vacuum-cleaner-blow-suction-2-in-1-100000rpm): A versatile robotic vacuum cleaner designed for efficient home cleaning.
- [Handheld Vacuum Cleaner - AutoBot Professional Handheld](https://landing-pages.autobot.im/): A professional-grade handheld vacuum cleaner for versatile cleaning tasks.
- [Portable Vacuum Cleaner | AutoBot Cordless High Suction](https://landing-pages.autobot.im/portable-vacuum-cleaner): A cordless vacuum cleaner offering high suction power for portability.
- [Car Vacuum Cleaner | AutoBot Cordless High Suction](https://landing-pages.autobot.im/car-vacuum-cleaner): A specialized vacuum cleaner designed for cleaning vehicles.

## Accessories
- [Accessory](https://autobot.im/collections/accessory): A section dedicated to various accessories for cleaning devices.
- [AutoBot Compressed Air Duster](https://autobot.im/collections/autobot-compressed-air-duster): A tool for cleaning delicate electronics and hard-to-reach areas.
- [Car phone holder](https://autobot.im/collections/frontpage): An accessory designed to securely hold phones in vehicles.

## Home Appliances
- [Air Purifier](https://autobot.im/collections/air-purifier-for-car): A device designed to improve indoor air quality by removing pollutants.
- [AutoBot Self-Clean Handler Vacuum](https://autobot.im/collections/autobot-self-clean-handler-vaccum): A vacuum cleaner that features a self-cleaning handler for ease of use.
- [Hair Dryer - AutoBot Vacuum](https://autobot.im/pages/hair-dryer?srsltid=AfmBOoo65fKosae1eixiZfoA-QK07PLCv_kW_v0Jj50Wp7XYkWp4TI9V): A high-efficiency hair dryer designed for quick drying.

## User Actions
- [Log in](https://autobot.im/account/login): Access your account to manage orders and preferences.
- [Create account](https://autobot.im/account/register): Sign up for a new account to start shopping.
- [Search](https://autobot.im/search): A search function to find specific products quickly.
- [Cart](https://autobot.im/cart): View and manage items selected for purchase.

- [Watch the Video](https://youtu.be/KcwQxe55pxg): A video showcasing product features and benefits.
